CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 2, 1945, pg. 8 reads: "Student Aid Committee Gathers - A fine group of public-spirited citizens met Monday night at Kay Boys Club to assist in working out plans for the mammoth card party to be given June 14 at the YMHA, to benefit the Student Aid Committee of the Urban League. Top left photo, left to right: Lois Buchanan, Ethel Ramos Harris, Betty Fitzgerald and Adria Poole...-Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Lois Buchanan, Ethel Ramos Harris, Betty Fitzgerald, and Adria Poole, posed in Kay Boys Club
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Paintings--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hats--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Harris, Ethel Ramos.Kay Boys' Club (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
